extendedInfo.description: Practice your shooting skills with a high power sniper rifle. Practice in three scenes from the map De Hiekka.!. Build a veritable paradise 	-- while you win prizes for your speed and quick wit! game with realistic physical experience. Once you start, you can't stop!????? How to play ?????- Touch the arrow and fire with sniper.- You need to score as many points as possible within the given time, since each stage has target points to proceed to the next stage.????? Highlighted Features ?????- Five courts, choose your favorite themed environment.- Great shooting experience.- Various difficulty levels, to make the game more exciting and interesting.- Well-designed arena, to make the game more enjoyable and addictive.- Bright and vibrant graphics & effects.- It is a game that is accessible for people of all ages. There is no limit to the amount of fun that can be had in Counter Strike De Hiekka ! This apps is ads supported thanks for your understanding Tags: shooting game, sniper game, counter down fire game, firing game

reviews.title: Sucks
